Name: CubeBall VR
About the game: Classic puzzle games recreated in VR Did you ever play with little cubes with balls inside it? Just roll the balls to where they belong. Seems easy, but it's not! Carefully designed to bring back classic puzzles to VR. There are even more fun and interesting puzzles that was designed from scratch. New puzzles have moving parts that was not possible in physical form. More puzzles will be added. Supported VR It currently supports HTC Vive . Oculus Touch support planned.
Meta Title: CubeBall VR: May 10, 2017, Tachyon Factory and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on CubeBall VR? Check out the release date (May 10, 2017), developer insights from Tachyon Factory, and a complete game summary.
